trans-unit.source: Wraps and creates an object that you can use as a binding source.
trans-unit.target: 包装和创建可以用作绑定源的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> fails when it does not have permissions to perform reflection on the given type or member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> 当没有权限执行反射的给定的类型或成员时，无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Permissions Requirements in [Binding Sources Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的权限要求[绑定源概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: There are many ways to create an object to use as a binding source.
trans-unit.target: 有多种方法来创建要用作绑定源的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create your object in the resources section of your [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] page, or you can create your object in code and set it as the `DataContext` of your window.
trans-unit.target: 例如，创建你的对象的资源部分中你[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]页上，也可以在代码中创建你的对象并将其设置为`DataContext`你的窗口。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> enables you to create your object in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and make it available as a binding source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> 可用于创建你的对象中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]并使其可用作绑定源。

trans-unit.source: It provides the following properties that enable you to execute a query on your object and bind to the results.
trans-unit.target: 它提供的以下属性，使您能够在你的对象上执行查询并将绑定到结果。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ConstructorParameters%2A> property to pass parameters to the constructor of your object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ConstructorParameters%2A>属性将参数传递给你的对象的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodName%2A> property to call a method and use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodParameters%2A> property to pass parameters to the method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodName%2A>属性来调用方法，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodParameters%2A>属性将参数传递给方法。

trans-unit.source: You can then bind to the results of the method.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以绑定到方法的结果。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.IsAsynchronous%2A> property to specify whether to perform object creation in a worker thread or in the active context.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.IsAsynchronous%2A>属性可指定是否要在工作线程或活动的上下文中执行对象创建。

trans-unit.source: This class is also useful when you want to replace your current binding source object with another object and have all the associated bindings updated.
trans-unit.target: 此类也是有用的当你想要将你当前的绑定源对象替换为另一个对象和更新所有关联的绑定。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> provides a convenient way to create and use objects as binding source objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but it does not replace existing data models.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> 可以方便地创建和使用对象作为绑定源对象中的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但不替换现有数据模型。

trans-unit.source: If you are implementing your own objects for data binding, see [Binding Sources Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md) for information and recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 如果你要实现您自己的数据绑定的对象，请参阅[绑定源概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md)有关信息和建议。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Starts to create the requested object, either immediately or on a background thread, based on the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.IsAsynchronous" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 根据 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.IsAsynchronous" /> 属性的值，立即开始创建请求的对象，或在后台线程上开始创建。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> methods of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>基类方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of parameters to pass to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 获取要传递给该构造函数的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: The list of parameters to pass to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给该构造函数的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Changing this collection implicitly causes the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> to refresh.
trans-unit.target: 更改此集合会隐式导致<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>刷新。

trans-unit.source: When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A> is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 更改多个刷新导致属性，使用时<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A>建议。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: The highlighted lines in the following example use an <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> as a wrapper for a `Person` object.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例使用突出显示的行<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>作为包装器`Person`对象。

trans-unit.source: The `<ObjectDataProvider.ConstructorParameters>` element shows how to pass a <xref:System.String> argument to its constructor.
trans-unit.target: `<ObjectDataProvider.ConstructorParameters>`元素演示如何将传递<xref:System.String>给其构造函数的自变量。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to perform object creation in a worker thread or in the active context.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是在辅助线程还是在活动上下文中执行对象创建。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to perform object creation in a worker thread; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在辅助线程中执行对象创建；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful if you are binding to external data objects that are slow to be available.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是很有用，如果你正在绑定到速度较慢，可用的外部数据对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to call.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要调用的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to call.
trans-unit.target: 要调用的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to call a method on your object and use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodParameters%2A> property to pass parameters to the method.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于在你的对象上调用的方法和使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodParameters%2A>属性将参数传递给方法。

trans-unit.source: You can then bind to the results of the method.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以绑定到方法的结果。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of parameters to pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: 获取要传递给方法的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: The list of parameters to pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给方法的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty list.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空列表。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodName%2A> property to call a method on your object and use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodParameters%2A> property to pass parameters to the method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodName%2A>属性来在你的对象上调用的方法和使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodParameters%2A>属性将参数传递给方法。

trans-unit.source: You can then bind to the results of the method.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以绑定到方法的结果。

trans-unit.source: Changing this collection implicitly causes the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> object to refresh.
trans-unit.target: 更改此集合会隐式导致<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>若要刷新的对象。

trans-unit.source: When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A> is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 更改多个刷新导致属性，使用时<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A>建议。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object used as the binding source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用作绑定源的对象。

trans-unit.source: The instance of the object constructed from <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ConstructorParameters" />, or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider" /> of which the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data" /> is used as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: 对象的实例是从 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ConstructorParameters" />，或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider" />（其中的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data" /> 用作 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance" />）构造的。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType%2A> is set to a non-null value, the property holds the object of the type specified by <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType%2A>设置为非 null 值，指定类型的对象属性包含<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance%2A> is assigned by the user, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType%2A> property returns the type of the assigned object.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance%2A>分配用户，通过<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType%2A>属性返回的分配对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> of the assigned source provider as the effective <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>、<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>分配的源提供程序中作为有效的<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A> is used, <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> will not update until <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A>使用时，<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>不会更新直到<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider" /> is assigned both an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType" /> and an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance" />; only one is allowed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider" /> 同时分配了 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance" />，只允许分配一个。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of object to create an instance of.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要创建其实例的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="null" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider" /> is uninitialized or explicitly set to null.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider" /> 未初始化或显式设置为 null，则该属性为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance" /> is assigned, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType" /> returns the type of the object or null if the object is null.
trans-unit.target: 如果分配了 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance" />，则 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType" /> 返回对象的类型或 null（如果对象为 null）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A> is used, <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> do not update until <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A>使用时，<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>不更新直到<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *myDataType*
trans-unit.target: *myDataType*

trans-unit.source: The data type to create an instance of.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的实例的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Use the [x:Type Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md) to set a type.
trans-unit.target: 使用[X:type 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md)设置类型。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider" /> is assigned both an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType" /> and an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance" />; only one is allowed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider" /> 同时分配了 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance" />，只允许分配一个。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ConstructorParameters" /> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否应保持 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ConstructorParameters" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性值已更改，不再是默认值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ConstructorParameters%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ConstructorParameters%2A>属性不具有简单的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你也正在开发的设计器通常调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>或开发你自己的控件包含<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodParameters" /> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否应保持 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodParameters" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性值已更改，不再是默认值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodParameters%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.MethodParameters%2A>属性不具有简单的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你也正在开发的设计器通常调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>或开发你自己的控件包含<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance" /> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否应保持 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性值已更改，不再是默认值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectInstance%2A>属性不具有简单的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你也正在开发的设计器通常调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>或开发你自己的控件包含<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType" /> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否应保持 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性值已更改，不再是默认值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider.ObjectType%2A>属性不具有简单的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你也正在开发的设计器通常调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>或开发你自己的控件包含<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>。
